entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as marching purposefully across the grass, indicating her determination and confidence.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is described as jogging to keep up with Hermione, suggesting that she is trying to match Hermione's pace or energy level.

entities.name: forbidden forest
entities.description: The Forbidden Forest is mentioned as the location where Hermione and Umbridge are walking. It is described as having trees with tops that can be seen now, suggesting that they have arrived at a clearing or a spot from which the forest's canopy is visible.

relationships.description: Hermione and Umbridge are walking together, with Umbridge trying to keep up with Hermione's pace.
